choices: The ladies that didn't make it on this page
1.content: Pick a girl to fatten up however you like.
1.title: Whom to start with?

choices: Start at dinner tonight and eat more than usual
Ask her children to help feed mama
Start eating what she can get her hands on when no one else is around
Ask one of the other girls for tips
11.content:
Eureka smiled as she was side by side with Renton in the Gekkostate's galley while she helped prepare dinner for the ship of 18 members. She was in a total state of bliss being with a boy she loved dearly and enjoyed the various aromas that the kitchen had to offer. The meal itself was a massive feast rather than a small dinner as pork cutlets and shepard's pie were made for the crew whose tastes were varied but opinions on the matter were the same: the food was exquiste and nothing that fast food could even fathom to replicate.

"Renton, the mixed vegetables are done. Should we prepare anything else?" Eureka asked as she set out the final dishes before they called everyone in for supper. Renton shook his head as he came to the window with a luscious chocolate fudge cake he himself had prepared. "Wow. Renton, it looks so good." she complimened as the cake was plenty big enough to be a meal itself. Renton admired his handy work as he went to wahs up.

"Thanks Eureka. I hope you will enjoy it. It would be nice to see you eating some more though." Eureka was confused as she turned to Renton, whose backwas to her. Her face was blushing as she didn;t know how to take the comment.

"Eat more? I eat a moderate amount."

"True, but you do look awfully skinny. That and the fact anytime I see you eat, you only take the smallest portions. I even overheard Mischa who made a comment on how your body is running with no body fat."

"I need body fat?" Eureka was now confused as the other girls on the ship created a massive storm if any one of them gained so much as one single pound. "Do people need fatin their bodies?"

"Actually yeah." Renton exclaimed, remembering one thing from school when he was too busy day dreaming about riding the waves in the sky. "Fats contain energy for your body. So it'snatural you should eat a little more.Okay?" Renton gave her a peck on the head as he went to call everyone for dinner. Eureka, meanwhile, was thinking of his statements.

"So getting fatter...is healthier?" She didn't know to make heads or tails as being a Coralian alien, she had never even experienced what it is like to gain weight. She stared out at the copious quantities of food and nodded. "Alright. I should eat more. Renton said its good for me to gain weight. Maybe he'll like it."

Eureka stopped for a second. "How do I go about gaining weight though?"
11.title: An Alien Concept (no pun intended)

112.content:
The next morning, Eureka went to her children to help feed her.

"Now listen, I want you three to help me gain weight. I want all of you to get as much food as you can that will fatten me up." Eureka said.

"Right mama." they said at once.

All three of them went to the galley when no one was looking and grabed all of the junk food and other stoff they can carry and brought it back to Eureka. They put all of the food onto her bed.

"Thanks kids. You all are don for now." Eureka said.

They all left Eureka to eat. She started to eat the food. After an hour of eating, she had eaten about half of the food the children brought her. She had gained atleast 45 pounds and has a belly that is sticking about 6 inches infront of her. She laid back against the wall and rubbed her belly. Then she...
112.title: Ask her children to help feed mama

1121.content: Continued eating. Eureka eat for 10 more minutes untill she needed help being feed. So she called her children in and told them to feed her. The did and did it fast because it was getting close to lunch. They stuffed everythink they can into her mouth. It took them 2 hours to feed Eureka before lunch. When they finihed, Eureka gained 45 more pounds. They all went down to the galley for lunch. This time, Eureka took three times of food than normal. When she finished, she went back to her room and rested.
1121.title: Continued eating

11211.content:
When Eureka woke up from her nap, it was dinner time. She went down to the dining hall and found the table set for one and a lot of food on it. She found a note on the plate and it said:

"Dear Eureka,

We all went to a restrant to eat. Your children are with us so you don't have to worry about them. See you later.

Renten."

Eureka then sat down in the chair and started to eat. She can feel her belly grow and her dress get tighter by the second. Soon her dress was getting to tight so she unbuttoned it and continued to eat. It took her and hour and a half to eat all of the food. When she finished, she gained at least 140 pounds. She went back to her room and weighed herself.

"367. I gained 245 pounds today. If I keep eating like I did today, I will be to fat for the ship to fly." Eureka said to her self.
11211.title: The feast

112112.content:
Eureka woke up the next morning and saw Renton in her room looking at her and he had a big cake behind him.

“Morning Eureka.” Renton said.

“Oh, morning Renton. What are you doing in my room?” Eureka said.

“I came to help fatten you up. And I got you a bigger dress for you.”

“It looks like my old small one but way bigger.”

“Try it on Eureka.”

So Eureka put on her new dress and it was 3 times bigger than Eureka’s current body size. Then she sat down on her bed and started to eat the cake. Renton had left her room to let her eat. It took Eureka 2 and a half hours to eat the whole cake. She left her room to find more food. She had her hand on he belly rubbing it. She got to the kitchen to get more food and saw 30 cakes in there and they were all for her. She started to eat the cakes and gained more and more weight. When she stopped, she had finished half of the cakes before she was full. Eureka now weighed 645 pounds. She loved being fat and gaining weight.
112112.title: the next day

1121121.content:
Even though Eureka was full, she kept on eating. With her full belly being over stuffed, it started to push out farther. When Eureka finished all of the cakes, Renton walked in. Eureka was on her big belly looking at Renton.

“Wow Eureka, you are even more beautiful now with your bigger, fatter size.” Renton said.

“Renton, you think so” Eureka said while trying to sit up onto her big butt.

“Yes, I love you even more than your old skinny self Eureka. I wish I could fatten you up even more.”

“You can Renton. I want to get fatter. I want to be the fattest girl in the world.”
1121121.title: keep eating

choices: Eureka doubles in size by dinner
11211212.content:
Over the past week, Renton Helped Eureka fatten up until she weighed 2000 pounds. Because of Eurekas' massive eating, she had became to big to sit up in her room so she has to lay down on her belly to keep eating and growing.

"Wow. Thanks Renton for helping me get this big. And for getting me this new 2 peice, super elastice bakini." Eureka said.

"No problem Eureka. I'm always happy to help you any time, my cute, fat girlfriend." Renton said.

Renton left Eurekas' room to get another extra large cake when he felt the Gekkostate rumble. He rushed back to Eurekas' room and saw that she had almost out sized her room. Then Renton got the idea of putting her into a large warehouse so she doesn't have to worry about out growing the room she is in. With the help of Nirvash, they moved Eureka to the biggest warehouse in town. Then Renton went to the market and baught all of the most fattening food it had in stock. He went back to the warehouse and started to feed Eureka to satisfy her evergrowing hunger.
11211212.title: The next week

114.title: Ask one of the other girls for tips

1143.content: Someone force feeds Eureka to get fat, who is it?
1143.title: Force feeding Ideas

11431.content:
Not even realizing what kind of enemy she was facing, recklessly Eureka begun to leave the Gekko with out Renton on board the Nirvash, this was a fatal mistake on the pilot’s judgment as the easily outmaneuvered by this unknown pilot, it was almost as if Eureka was fighting her self and losing. This black Nirvash was quicker than Nirvash, zipping around like it owned the air, freely it moved just trying to keep up with it was quite the difficult task for just eureka to partake in as Nirvash wasn’t at optimal levels with just her piloting it Renton was also needed if they ever stood a chance. Nirvash couldn’t even compete with whom ever was piloting this LFO, Anemone was the secret weapon of the United Federation, a coralian modified human whom only purpose was to battle and capture the human form coralian named Eureka. Being swiftly defeated by this pink haired girl took this fight as more as just play time with the cute little coralian, barely was it even a fight to her with her LFO’s power she quickly over whelmed the Nirvash in every turn and move Eureka could think of, trying to fall back to the Gekko seemed like the best choice that Eureka could have make. Not able to over whelm or even break through the defense that Anemone has placed around herself, no matter the attack that was thrown at her Anemone just shrugged it off like it was nothing, like swatting a fly Eureka was swiftly defeated by the weapon of United Federation. Trying her best to get away from the United Federation and Anemone was beginning to prove to be futile, corner by the enemy with the Gekko having no way to collect the Eureka from her recent predicament all they could do was watch as the Nirvash and Eureka were collected by the United Federation, no one knew what kind of horrors would await within the hands of Dewy Novak.

By the order of Dewy, Anemone was sent to watch over the coralian while he attended to other things that needed his attention at the moment, not even giving the young girl the satisfaction of a job well done. Anemone didn’t really mind babysitting the sleeping girl, looking upon Eureka, Anemone thought just how cute this coralian looked even when she was asleep. Looking upon Eureka Anemone knew that she wanted to use this girl as her personal plaything, looking upon Eureka teal hair, supple cream skin and magenta eyes Anemone knew that she will have fun with this girl. Jumping down from the bed that was placed in the room that was place in the ware house of the United Federation. Grinning devilishly about what she was about to do with the coralian, “oh my, my doesn’t my little piglet love her sleep so much, but she shouldn’t worry much about it since her has her new master to obey and obey she will” Anemone stated with a grin. While Anemone begun her plans to make Eureka her pet, team Gekko was just begging to try to find where they had taken their team member and what their end goal with her would even be, “I should have been there, why did she leave with out me?” Renton ask himself over and over in his head, while they did retrieve the Nirvash from a mountainous terrain, although it was badly damaged, it was still functional. Gidget was hearing chatter between the the Federation’s troops, not able to pinpoint a direct line to where they were keeping Eureka, all they could do was wait. Throughout all of the radio chatter that was heard from the united federation’s communication, a few items stuck out they were a bit odd for a military unit to order, sweets, shackles, a collar and a few girly outfits were some things that weren’t something that they would need, only a teen girl would need to have like Eureka.
11431.title: Captured

choices: Hilda and Talho, who will "teach" Gidget some manners
An obsessed fan who wants Gidget to stay with her
A magazine owner, who will pay Gidget to model plus size
13.content:
Gidget couldn't help but to walk around with a sense of pride as months of begging and pleaded finally got her what she had wanted for so long: To be the cover girl on ray=out. The magazine funded by the Gekkostate usually portrayed the more buxom and refined woman that was Talho on their ship. However, the revenue gained from the last issue was lower than usual and it had the usual Talho acting sexy for all the eager men to buy and ogle her picture. This is where Gidget came in, as air headed as she was, devised a plan to have the others ladies pose for the magazine. Hilda denied it and Eureka was unsure of what to do, so Gidget became the April cover girl.

"I can't beleive it, all the guys will be wanting my autograph now!" She said as she kissed the magazine cover with her creamy tan body posing in a bikini. "and Doggie will be so jealous." She couldn't help but to coo with delight as she ran into,literally, Hilda.

"You seriously need to lay off that crap." Hilda chided Gidget. "It's bad enough you got Talho bumped off the cover, now you go all around acting like Renton was when he was on the cover. And his behavior was more acceptable than your since he didn't tempt anyone to do it."Gidget honestly wasn't paying attention as she still was fascinated with the published pictures of herself.

"Huh? What was that?" Hilda shook her head and went about her business.

"At least Talho isn't as vain as you. You'd better be careful. Karma can be quite a bitch." Gidget didn't know how to make heads or tails of that comment but went on her business anyway as she wanted to walkaround the town they had stopped at to gain the admiration of her fans. And this plan worked like a charm. Gidget was taking up everyone's glory of her, wanting autographs and pictures. She knew it'd be a success but she never imagined it like this. After some time, she knew she had to get back to the Gekko and made her way back to the ship. Unfortunately, she never got to step foot in the hull as she felt something hit the back of her head, causing her to slump to the ground in an unconscious manner.

When she awoke some time later, she found out she was with...
13.title: Cover Girl Gone Wrong

choices: I'll get fat, but only a little at first
If fat equals happiness, I should gain quickly
Ask one of the crew for advise first
14.content:
Hilda yawned as she was sprawled out on the couch in the common area of the ship. With the way things were heading in the final battles before the Gekko would head to the Coralian Central Cluster, she had nothing to do on the ship. Sure, she piloted her LFO and fought with it plenty of times beforehand, but since all of that work was being taken up by Holland, she was left with her regular routine of Quarter Master of the ship. Even that was boring as barely any changes occured in the quotas on board. she stared at the white ceiling until some odd noise interupted the quaint silence of the room.

"I guess I'm hungry." She muttered to herself as she went to the kitchen to fix a snack. Normally she wouldn't eat between meals as her lifestyle was active from work on the ship to her yoga exercises she did keep her slim dark brown body in shape. But her trim tummy and tight butt were being replaced by a slow layerof fat that accumulated over the course of five days or so. Hilda wasn;t oblivious to the change as she did check her weight bi-weekly and the two times she had done it in this week showed a 4 lb gain.

"I should stop and try and lose the weight but I feel so..." Hilda stopped as she sat down with her turkey club and bag of chips, getting situated on the couch again. "I haven't felt so comfortable and relaxed in so long." She took a bite of her sandwich and poked her belly button. "Does that mean I'll be happier if I was fatter?" She contimplated the idea for several seconds before deciding...
14.title: Side Effects of Laziness Include...

15.content: The other ladies of E7
15.title: The Next Set

choices: Yes, but get a female crew member
Yes, but get a male crew member
151.content:
Mischa sighed as she labored on her computer on board the Gekko-Go, the revolutionary ship of the Gekkostate. As ships doctor, she maintained a variety of tasks to surgery to taking care of minor colds and stomach aches the other crew members got from eating too much junk food.

"This gets more and more boring each day." She complained aloud as she typed up her various reports on her main PC, trying to figure out a way to alleviate her boredom. "I could always just try and entertain myself...but I don't have too many hobbies. It's not like I can date. I have an ex and am 44..." Unfortunately, there weren't many options that were available to her at her age and interests.

"There is always science..."she trailed off, deciding to fiddle around with her various medical programs, in hopes she could find something new about the human body. "Heh...maybe I can discover a cure for cancer or something miraculous like that. Fat chance."

She came to the conclusion she wasn't going to let any of the crew members mess with their simulated bodies on the program, so she made the decision to put her own data in the computer to see what could happen. She came up with a theory and put it in motion to set it off. After a few days of messing around on the computer, she came to an amazing discovery.

"This is impossible..." She found out that at her age and weight, if she ate certain foods and commited herself to a regime of activities, she could become hugely obese and still be perfectly healthy. She looked over the data again and again and realized there was no misconstrued information and that it could work.

"Well..." she examined her body and tried to outweigh the options of doing something like this, to test if there was a cure for obesity in terms of this battle plan.

"This is for science...and it could be a huge medical achievement...and I could get a grant for this is my data proves to be useful. Should I get some help with this though? Would one of the others be willing to assist me and be my coach? Great, another tough call..." She knew that this was the best thing to do. It could allow her to reach new and unfound boundaries, but the big question should if she should get help.
151.title: A New Discovery

154.content: Renton and Moondoggie WG. How about it? It'll be fun.
154.title: What about some male stuff?

choices: Hilda proceeds to stuff Renton, who tries fights back
Hilda storms out to leave Renton to his gluttony
1541.content:
Renton sulked towards the Gekko's store as he was berated by both Holland and Talho for accidentally ruining their laundry for the fourth time this month. He knew he had screwed up big time, but verbal abuse with phrases such as "useless" and "moron" were never welcomed to him. What made things worse was that Eureka was in the Med Bay again as her headaches were getting increasingly worse. Renton sighed as he entered the galley that he was in charge of stocking items and selling them to the other crew members of the ship. However, since barely any one came in at thislate of an hour, hehad the place to himself.

"What will help tonight?" He muttered as he picked up several bags of chips, cookies, and candy bars from the shelves. Renton's method of coping with depression mixed in with loneliness was to go on several binges of junk food to help ease the aches. However, this wasn't doing him any actual service as the last time he was in such a state before he fled the Gekkostate, he literally tore through a dozen bags of potato chips in the course of two days. His unhealthy eating habits weren't doing any good to his body as he felt his waist line becoming tighter with each passing binge he went on.

He got the massive pile of a dozen snacks with a six pack of Dr. Pepper and began his feast of sugary goodness. He was so entranced into the cornucopia of food that he didn't notice Hilda walking into the store, looking for some eyeliner she ran out of.

"Hey Renton, can you...Geez!" was all she could muster as she saw the mountain of treats Renton collected for himself. "I thought the others ate bad, but if you keep that up, we might need a bigger ship." She teased. Renton was still in an odd food bliss as he further ignored Hilda. This annoyed her as one thing she honestly couldn;t stand was people being rude to her. The athletic African woman slammed her fist on the counter, causing several of the bags to spill their contents, some salty chips absorbing the puddle of soda that was all over the counter.

"Hmmm?" Was all he could mutter as Hilda was getting on her last nerve. "Did you need something?"

Hilda wanted to force the food down his gullet, but she didn't want to lose her cool. However, she was feeling awfully tempted to teach Renton some manners.
1541.title: Cheaper than Anti-Depressants

choices: He runs into Holland, who notices his engorged belly
He reaches Medbay, but isn't allowed in yet
15412.content:
Hilda sighed deeply; she had better things to do than deal with Renton and his eating habits. Shaking her head, she left the room.

Renton took no notice of this. He continued his bingeing, shoving chips, candy bars, and countless other types of junk food into his waiting gullet. Several times, he felt his waistline tighten, but paid it little heed; he REALLY needed this food.

After a good 15 minutes, he'd cleared the massive food pile he'd amassed. Letting out a happy groan, he fell onto his back, rubbing his stomach. It now formed a massive bulge underneath his red and white jacket, protruding at least a few inches into the air. His pants felt uncomfortably tight, but Renton was much too occupied rubbing his stomach and enjoying the sensations to care.

After a while though, he began thinking of Eureka in Medbay, and he frowned. Groaning with effort, he got to his feet, his engorged stomach throwing off his balance a little bit. He placed a hand on the wall to steady himself, then began walking towards Medbay, his engorged but still-concealed gut protruding in front of him.

What happens next?
15412.title: Hilda storms out to leave Renton to his gluttony

1543.content:
The protagonist of the little-known PS2 games, that is~

(don't worry, if no one picks up on this, I'll figure something out...)
1543.title: Sumner Sturgeon?

15432.content: Let's fatten up one of the kids
15432.title: Mater

info.brief_description: The first E7 WG interactive story, with unlimited possiblities. 50 GP per good chapter.
info.description:
There are not many Eureka Seven WG stories and such, so the pie's the limit with this one. There are a good number of ladies that need to be fattened upin this series, so just use the power of your imagination and have as much fun as possible.If you want to expand the men in the series, it's acceptable as well. Since this a WG story, nothing with expansion, blueberries or anything of the like.

Aside from that, have fun!

I will give 50 GP to good additions.
